section_a.beneficiaries: CHILDREN, YOUNG ADULTS & FAMILIES AFFECTED BY THE COST OF LIVING CRISIS, INFLATION & THOSE THAT FACE VARIOUS FINANCIAL ISSUES IN THE RENFREWSHIRE & SURROUNDING AREAS, BY PROVIDING FREE & HEAVILY REDUCED COST MUSIC TUITION, THEATRE/DRAMA PERFORMANCES, AND VARIOUS CREATIVE RELATED, COMMUNITY & CREATIVE BUILDING GROUPS. MUSIC TUITION HAS BEEN PROVEN TO BE A VITAL DEVELOPMENT SKILL. IT IS AN IMPORTANT ASPECT TO BUILDING CAREERS, IMPROVING EDUCATION SUCCESS, AND MOST IMPORTANTLY, SPARKING BRAIN DEVELOPMENT TO CHILDREN AS YOUNG AS 6 MONTHS OLD. WE’RE CURRENTLY IN A SITUATION MEANING THAT THESE FUNDAMENTAL ARTS ARE NOT CURRENTLY ACCESSIBLE TO EVERY HOUSEHOLD.. WITH EDUCATION FUNDING BEING SQUEEZED TO PROVIDE SHORT MUSIC TUITION IN SCHOOLS, IT LEAVES AN EXTREMELY IMPORTANT AND EVER GROWING GROUP OF FAMILIES & POVERTY STRICKEN HOUSEHOLDS UNABLE TO PURSUE DREAM CAREERS , BUILD CONFIDENCE, BUILD LIKEMINDED RELATIONSHIPS, AND RECEIVE VITAL FUTURE DEVELOPMENT. THIS IS A SUBJECT CLOSE TO MY HEART, WITH PERSONAL FINANCES AND DISPOSABLE INCOME PROVING TIGHT THROUGHOUT MY CHILDHOOD, LIVING IN A SINGLE PARENT HOUSEHOLD AS A YOUNG MUSICIAN WAS A STRUGGLE FOR MY FAMILY. I WANT TO MAKE SURE THAT NO OTHER CHILD OR YOUNG ADULT IN THE AREA HAS TO FACE THE SAME ISSUES. MUSIC IS FOR EVERYONE, AND WITH OUR PLANS TO GET THE WHOLE COMMUNITY TOGETHER IN GROUPS AND WORKSHOPS, WE STRIVE TO MAKE IT EASILY ACCESSIBLE, EASY TO ENROL, AND FINANCIALLY STRESS FREE. NO ONE SHOULD BE HELD BACK ON THEIR DREAMS DUE TO FINANCIAL DIFFICULTY, WHICH IS A GROWING CONCERN FOR FAMILIES IN THE RENFREWSHIRE AREA. WE WANT TO CHANGE THAT

PROVIDING THESE SERVICES TO THE COMMUNITY AS A WHOLE WILL OPEN DOORS TO ALL FAMILIES, WITHOUT THE STRESS OF FINDING THE EXTRA PENNIES TO AFFORD SUCH SERVICES. BY PROVIDING GROUP CLASSES, WE WILL GIVE CHILDREN THE OPPORTUNITY TO FIND GROUPS TO WORK WITH, MAKE FRIENDSHIPS & GROW VITAL COMMUNITY SKILLS THAT WILL VASTLY IMPACT FUTURE DEVELOPMENT. MUSICAL THEATRE CLASSES WILL PUSH CONFIDENCE, AND CAN HELP IN VARIOUS TEAM BUILDING SKILLS IN LATER LIFE, AS WELL AS OPENING DOORS TO CAREERS NOT ONLY IN MUSIC, BUT EDUCATION, CUSTOMER SERVICE, MANAGERIAL ROLES, TEAM LEADERS ETC.
